data.name: Mirror Party Emoji
data.detailed_description: This free DLC, Mirror Party Emoji, contains 54 Emojis of 9 characters. After and installing this DLC, please go to your Steam Library → Mirror Party → Right Click → Property → Local Files → Browse... → Mirror Party Emoji.
data.about_the_game: This free DLC, Mirror Party Emoji, contains 54 Emojis of 9 characters. After and installing this DLC, please go to your Steam Library → Mirror Party → Right Click → Property → Local Files → Browse... → Mirror Party Emoji.
data.short_description: This free DLC, Mirror Party Emoji, contains 54 Emojis of 9 characters. After and installing this DLC, please go to your Steam Library → Mirror Party → Right Click → Property → Local Files → Browse... → Mirror Party Emoji.
data.supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
